address: Xã Xuân Giang, Huyện Thọ Xuân, Tỉnh Thanh Hóa
thought:
**Analysis of Administrative Changes for "Xã Xuân Giang, Huyện Thọ Xuân, Tỉnh Thanh Hóa"**

Okay, so I'm presented with the need to determine the new administrative unit for "Xã Xuân Giang, Huyện Thọ Xuân, Tỉnh Thanh Hóa" due to the district elimination directive. My approach will be methodical, starting with the provincial level. I need to make sure I am working with the most recent information and regulations.

First, I quickly confirm that Thanh Hóa province remains unchanged, according to the relevant resolution on province-level mergers. That's a quick check and confirmed.

Next, I understand the instruction to eliminate districts, thus, "Huyện Thọ Xuân" will no longer exist. This simplifies things -  the new ward will directly fall under the province. Now, the meat of my analysis: the ward-level restructuring.

I immediately turn to the resolutions. My primary focus is on resolutions concerning Thanh Hóa province, as specified by the prompt. I know that looking for matching entries related to "Xã Xuân Giang" is key.

My focus is on the "Other Resolutions" section dedicated to Thanh Hóa. I analyze the contents of the resolutions.

I found a clear hit in **Resolution 1686/NQ-UBTVQH15 (Tỉnh Thanh Hóa):** Specifically, line 53, which is the key. It details the complete merging of "Xã Xuân Giang" (among other wards) into a new ward. Specifically, the new ward is named "Xã Thọ Xuân".

After this clear identification, I then confirmed my findings by checking the list of new wards. I was able to locate "xã Thọ Xuân" with the correct province information, which corroborates my conclusions.

So, in summary, based on a careful review of the relevant resolutions, particularly Resolution 1686/NQ-UBTVQH15, my determination is that "Xã Xuân Giang, Huyện Thọ Xuân, Tỉnh Thanh Hóa" has been restructured into the new administrative unit "Xã Thọ Xuân" under Tỉnh Thanh Hóa. My confidence in this determination is high given the explicit and direct mapping provided in the resolution.

citation.header: 1686/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Thanh Hóa
citation.line: 53. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của thị trấn Thọ Xuân và các xã Xuân Hồng, Xuân Trường, Xuân Giang thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Thọ Xuân.
